reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and of good quality, with one noting its distinguished gold color. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some find it great, others mention the sleeves are too short. The material quality is also mixed, with some praising it while others find it feels cheaply made. Moreover, the fabric sturdiness is negative, with one customer reporting issues with sequins getting caught in the fabric. Additionally, the design and see-through aspects receive mixed reactions. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THIS DRESS - I DO NOT HAVE A PERFECT SHAPE, BUT I FEEL SO BEAUTIFUL IN IT!
items.body: It is a gorgeous dress. I am 5'8" and between the 2x,3x,4x the 3x fit me the best. *They have one funky, easy to fix flaw that can be fixed within a 1/2 hour or so. Bra pads that are up by your clavical... not where you need it ; ). Take them out very carefully and sew it back up. It is sewn in by a 1"-2" lengths. It is classy, not brash. So beautiful and not too low cut. Read more
items.author: Dawnn Morales

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but unwearable
items.body: The sequins stick together when you move. As soon as I tried on the dress, the sequins under the arm stick to the bodice of the dress. I was afraid I would damage the dress even in try on. There is no way I could get through an evening with it. I think it is because the way the sequins are attached. I bought another sequined option and it was fine. It is a shame because the look of the dress was beautiful and the design and cut were nice. I did size up significantly but that is pretty typical for Asian production. Read more
items.author: Tish

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty & comfortable
items.body: I'm a petit 8 so this was just too long, requiring me to alter the length. And the sequins keep getting caught in the threads. It seems well made and comfortable, but the half lining is not my style. It does have good stretchiness, & good quality material. Read more
items.author: Marie W

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sequins stick and catch on fabric
items.body: The dress is very pretty, but I unfortunately had some major issues with it. I bought it to wear to sing at a friend's black tie wedding, and it looked nice and fit ok. But it came with small pads sewn into the bust, which seems really silly for a gown with sleeves and lining.. (I could understand if it were strapless or sheer). They looked ridiculous on my already ample bust, so I paid a tailor to remove them, and it fit better, looked nice. But then came the wedding.. the sequins on the sleeves attached themselves to the body of the dress any time my arms were down at my sides, and my pianist and I literally had to rip threads to unattach my arms from my body. I could not get it off fast enough once the wedding was over.. literally took it off in the car and drove home in my coat. So, I'll never wear it again, and I can't return it because I had it altered. Very disappointed. :( Read more
items.author: CrystalC

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Returned
items.body: Not flattering for larger sized women. Read more
items.author: Margaret

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars very fancy and pretty dress
items.body: Very fancy dress, nice quality but I ended up returning it because the size runs small. Read more
items.author: iman khan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and price!
items.body: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE! It was exactly what I was looking for! Read more
items.author: Sheila R

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Extremely Disappointed
items.body: Very disappointed with the material. It's not as how it looks. It looks very tacky. Amazon is falling off standards. I thinks I'm slowly going to stop purchasing off Amazon because they sell anything even when the item is not reputable. Read more
items.author: Stacy Ann

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Maxi Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Maxi Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B-grey, B-gold, B-royalblue, B-wine, B-black, B-lightgreen, Black, B-navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
